item.title: Bus driver loses $84,000 pension after he was caught stealing $7
item.description: A Japanese bus driver with 29 years of service lost his retirement package worth $84,000 after being fired for stealing $7 from passengers' fares.

item.title: 3/12: CBS Morning News
item.description: U.S. 25% tariffs on steel and aluminum take effect; Southwest Airlines to start charging for checked bags for the first time.

item.title: 4 people killed in cable car accident in southern Italy
item.description: A cable car accident on a mountain near Naples left at least four people dead and one critically injured, according to officials in southern Italy.
